Let me tell you a little bit about myself

My story

Honing my programming skills and learning new ways to create visually stunning, performant websites and web apps is my passion. I am eager to develop, collaborate, learn and maintain resilient code. After 10 years of professional work experience as a licensed civil engineer I fell in love with the different facets of web development.
